title: City at Night
description: (Warning: This story contains content some readers may find offensive or disturbing.)Follow the nocturnal ramblings of a world-hating misogynist as he is driven by an alienated lust out of the city centre and into the life of a solitary woman.(Noncon erotic short story.)You can get it here: https://www.smashwords.com/books/view...
author: Malthus Blake
